gameLabels.a_bicycle_has_2_wheels_bi_means_two: A bicycle has 2 wheels — "bi" means two.
gameLabels.a_butterfly_begins_as_a_tiny_egg_then_a_: A butterfly begins as a tiny egg, then a caterpillar, then a chrysalis.
gameLabels.a_caterpillar_turns_into_a_butterfly: A caterpillar turns into a butterfly.
gameLabels.a_clock_has_12_hours_on_its_face: A clock has 12 hours on its face.
gameLabels.a_dozen_always_means_twelve_of_something: A dozen always means twelve of something.
gameLabels.a_piano_has_black_and_white_keys: A piano has black and white keys.
gameLabels.a_postbox_in_britain_is_red: A postbox in Britain is red.
gameLabels.a_standard_clock_face_shows_numbers_1_th: A standard clock face shows numbers 1 through 12.
gameLabels.a_standard_piano_has_both_black_and_whit: A standard piano has both black and white keys.
gameLabels.a_triangle_has_3_sides_tri_means_three: A triangle has 3 sides — "tri" means three.
gameLabels.a_violin_is_a_musical_instrument: A violin is a musical instrument.
gameLabels.a_wagging_tail_usually_means_a_dog_is_fe: A wagging tail usually means a dog is feeling happy or excited.
gameLabels.a_week_has_7_days_from_monday_to_sunday: A week has 7 days, from Monday to Sunday.
gameLabels.african_elephants_are_the_biggest_animal: African elephants are the biggest animals on land.
gameLabels.alexander_fleming_discovered_penicillin_: Alexander Fleming discovered penicillin, one of the most important medical breakthroughs ever.
gameLabels.alexander_graham_bell_made_the_first_suc: Alexander Graham Bell made the first successful telephone call: "Mr. Watson, come here."
gameLabels.all_birds_lay_eggs_to_have_their_young: All birds lay eggs to have their young.
gameLabels.apollo_8_astronauts_orbited_the_moon_and: Apollo 8 astronauts orbited the Moon and took the famous "Earthrise" photograph.
gameLabels.apple_trees_produce_fruit_every_autumn: Apple trees produce fruit every autumn.
gameLabels.archaeologists_have_found_3_000_year_old: Archaeologists have found 3,000-year-old honey that was still edible!
gameLabels.armistice_day_world_war_i_ended_at_the_1: Armistice Day — World War I ended at the 11th hour of the 11th day of the 11th month.
gameLabels.as_chlorophyll_fades_in_autumn_leaves_tu: As chlorophyll fades in autumn, leaves turn beautiful warm colours.
gameLabels.australia_is_a_country_and_a_continent: Australia is a country and a continent.
gameLabels.australia_is_the_only_place_that_is_both: Australia is the only place that is both a country and a continent.
gameLabels.autumn_leaves_often_turn_orange_and_red: Autumn leaves often turn orange and red.
gameLabels.banana_plants_look_like_trees_but_are_ac: Banana plants look like trees but are actually giant herbs!
gameLabels.bats_can_actually_see_they_also_use_echo: Bats can actually see — they also use echolocation to navigate.
gameLabels.bees_collect_nectar_from_flowers_and_tur: Bees collect nectar from flowers and turn it into honey.
gameLabels.big_ben_is_the_famous_bell_inside_the_el: Big Ben is the famous bell inside the Elizabeth Tower at the Houses of Parliament.
gameLabels.bread_is_baked_in_an_oven: Bread is baked in an oven.
gameLabels.breakfast_is_the_first_meal_of_the_day: Breakfast is the first meal of the day.
gameLabels.britain_declared_war_on_germany_families: Britain declared war on Germany. Families gathered around their radios to hear the announcement.
gameLabels.britain_switched_to_decimal_currency_goo: Britain switched to decimal currency — goodbye to shillings and half-crowns!
gameLabels.buckingham_palace_in_london_is_the_offic: Buckingham Palace in London is the official royal residence.
gameLabels.camel_humps_actually_store_fat_not_water: Camel humps actually store fat, not water.
gameLabels.camels_store_water_in_their_humps: Camels store water in their humps.
gameLabels.carrots_are_a_type_of_meat: Carrots are a type of meat.
gameLabels.carrots_are_good_for_your_eyesight: Carrots are good for your eyesight.
gameLabels.carrots_are_vegetables_that_grow_in_the_: Carrots are vegetables that grow in the ground.
gameLabels.carrots_contain_vitamin_a_which_helps_ke: Carrots contain vitamin A, which helps keep your eyes healthy.
gameLabels.caterpillars_go_through_metamorphosis_to: Caterpillars go through metamorphosis to become butterflies.
gameLabels.cats_cannot_fly_but_they_are_great_climb: Cats cannot fly — but they are great climbers!
gameLabels.chocolate_is_made_from_cocoa_beans: Chocolate is made from cocoa beans.
gameLabels.christmas_day_is_on_the_25th_of_december: Christmas Day is on the 25th of December.
gameLabels.christmas_is_celebrated_on_december_25th: Christmas is celebrated on December 25th each year.
gameLabels.cocoa_beans_are_the_main_ingredient_in_c: Cocoa beans are the main ingredient in chocolate.
gameLabels.concorde_made_its_final_commercial_fligh: Concorde made its final commercial flight, ending the era of supersonic passenger travel.
gameLabels.cows_are_too_heavy_to_climb_trees: Cows are too heavy to climb trees!
gameLabels.crocodiles_are_carnivores_they_eat_meat: Crocodiles are carnivores — they eat meat.
gameLabels.d_day_allied_forces_landed_on_the_beache: D-Day — Allied forces landed on the beaches of Normandy, a turning point in the war.
gameLabels.diamonds_are_the_hardest_natural_materia: Diamonds are the hardest natural material on Earth.
gameLabels.dogs_wag_their_tails_when_happy: Dogs wag their tails when happy.
gameLabels.dolphins_are_found_in_oceans_and_seas_ar: Dolphins are found in oceans and seas around the world.
gameLabels.dough_is_shaped_and_baked_in_an_oven_to_: Dough is shaped and baked in an oven to make bread.
gameLabels.edmund_hillary_and_tenzing_norgay_reache: Edmund Hillary and Tenzing Norgay reached the summit of Mount Everest.
gameLabels.elephants_are_much_much_bigger_than_mice: Elephants are much, much bigger than mice!
gameLabels.elephants_are_the_largest_land_animals: Elephants are the largest land animals.
gameLabels.england_beat_west_germany_4_2_to_win_the: England beat West Germany 4-2 to win the World Cup at Wembley Stadium.
gameLabels.england_won_the_rugby_world_cup_in_a_dra: England won the Rugby World Cup in a dramatic final against Australia.
gameLabels.fish_breathe_through_gills_and_live_in_w: Fish breathe through gills and live in water.
gameLabels.football_pitches_are_always_rectangular_: Football pitches are always rectangular in shape.
gameLabels.frogs_are_amphibians_they_live_in_water_: Frogs are amphibians — they live in water and on land.
gameLabels.galloping_is_the_fastest_way_a_horse_can: Galloping is the fastest way a horse can run.
gameLabels.gertrude_ederle_became_the_first_woman_t: Gertrude Ederle became the first woman to swim across the English Channel.
gameLabels.giraffes_are_the_tallest_animals_on_eart: Giraffes are the tallest animals on Earth!
gameLabels.goldfish_can_actually_remember_things_fo: Goldfish can actually remember things for months!
gameLabels.goldfish_have_a_memory_of_only_3_seconds: Goldfish have a memory of only 3 seconds.
gameLabels.guglielmo_marconi_received_the_first_tra: Guglielmo Marconi received the first transatlantic radio signal, connecting continents.
gameLabels.hens_lay_eggs_which_is_where_our_breakfa: Hens lay eggs, which is where our breakfast eggs come from.
gameLabels.ice_cream_melts_if_it_gets_warm_so_it_is: Ice cream melts if it gets warm, so it is always cold.
gameLabels.if_you_look_at_italy_on_a_map_it_really_: If you look at Italy on a map, it really does look like a boot!
gameLabels.in_summer_the_sun_is_higher_and_days_are: In summer, the Sun is higher and days are longer, making it warmer.
gameLabels.italy_is_shaped_like_a_boot: Italy is shaped like a boot.
gameLabels.john_logie_baird_gave_the_first_public_d: John Logie Baird gave the first public demonstration of television.
gameLabels.king_edward_viii_abdicated_the_throne_fo: King Edward VIII abdicated the throne for love, and his brother became King George VI.
gameLabels.koalas_are_marsupials_not_bears_despite_: Koalas are marsupials, not bears, despite being called "koala bears".
gameLabels.lemons_are_sour_because_they_contain_cit: Lemons are sour because they contain citric acid.
gameLabels.live_aid_concert_raised_millions_for_fam: Live Aid concert raised millions for famine relief — a moment of global unity through music.
gameLabels.london_is_the_capital_of_england: London is the capital of England.

gameLabels.most_owls_are_nocturnal_active_at_night_: Most owls are nocturnal — active at night and sleeping by day.

gameLabels.the_beatles_appeared_on_the_ed_sullivan_: The Beatles appeared on The Ed Sullivan Show, watched by 73 million Americans.
